Description: Body sherd (mended from two fragments) of North Ionian large pottery vessel (krater or dinos); interior reserved; exterior, cream slip; goat moving left, head turned; red on body and haunch; filling ornament of dotted rosettes, roundel and crosses; foreleg of another goat to right; below, glazed zone with two reserved bands; added red and white bands at top.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.563)
